shared.model

Class DevCardList

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.DevCardList

  • public class DevCardList
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the development cards that a player or the bank has. Amounts must be non-negative

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DevCardList()
      Creates an empty DevCardList
      DevCardList(int soldiers, int special, int monuments)
      Creates a DevCardList with specified amounts of things
      DevCardList(java.util.Map<DevCardType,java.lang.Integer> cards)
      Creates a DevCardList with the specified amounts of cards

    • Constructor Detail

      • DevCardList

        public DevCardList()
        Creates an empty DevCardList

      • DevCardList

        public DevCardList(java.util.Map<DevCardType,java.lang.Integer> cards)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a DevCardList with the specified amounts of cards
        Parameters:
        cards - a Map specifying the quantities of each type of card.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the amounts are negative
        Preconditions
        all of the amounts in cards are non-negative
        Postconditions
        a DevCardList will be created with a copy of the specified card amounts

      • DevCardList

        public DevCardList(int soldiers,
           int special,
           int monuments)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a DevCardList with specified amounts of things
        Parameters:
        soldiers - the number of Soldiers to put in this DevCardList
        special - the number of Road Building, Monopoly, and Year of Plenty cards
        monuments - the number of Monuments
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of parameters are negative
        Preconditions
        all the parameters are non-negative
        Postconditions
        a DevCardList will be created with the specified card amounts

      • transferCardTo

        public void transferCardTo(DevCardList destination,
                  DevCardType type)
                    throws InvalidActionException
        Transfers a card from this DevCardList to another
        Parameters:
        destination - the DevCardList to transfer to
        type - the type of card you want to transfer
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if there isn't a card of the type to transfer
        Preconditions
        count(type) >= 1
        Postconditions
        the count of the specified type will be decreased on this DevCardList and increased on the destination DevCardList

      • transferRandomCardTo

        public void transferRandomCardTo(DevCardList destination)
                          throws InvalidActionException
        Transfers a random card from this DevCardList to another, with a uniform distribution based on counts
        Parameters:
        destination - the DevCardList to transfer to
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if there are no cards in this DevCardList
        Preconditions
        count() >= 1
        Postconditions
        the count of the randomly determined type will be decreased on this DevCardList and increased on the destination DevCardList

      • transferAll

        public void transferAll(DevCardList destination)
                 throws InvalidActionException
        Transfers a random card from this DevCardList to another, with a uniform distribution based on counts
        Parameters:
        destination - the DevCardList to transfer to
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if there are no cards in this DevCardList
        Preconditions
        count() >= 1
        Postconditions
        the count of the randomly determined type will be decreased on this DevCardList and increased on the destination DevCardList

      • useCard

        public void useCard(DevCardType type)
             throws InvalidActionException
        Uses a card of the given type
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the card to use
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if this DevCardList does not have at least 1 card of the type
        Preconditions
        count(type) >= 1
        Postconditions
        the count of the card's type will decrease by 1 and the appropriate action will be taken
